name: WARP (itch) (Tarif24)
description:
How To Play:

Objective: to kill all enemies and get to the last level to kill the boss

- you can explore the map to get weapon pickups and health pickups

- parts of the map will be locked till you kill all enemies

Controls:

WASD - To move

R - To reload

Q - To switch guns (if you have guns)

Left Click - To shoot

GitHub:

https://github.com/Raqib2/WARP_REPO
